title: San Francisco Considers Allowing Use of Deadly Robots by Police
description: The Police Department said robots would use deadly force only “in extreme circumstances.” Opponents said the policy could lead to more police violence.

title: Watch a Live Interview With Sam Bankman-Fried.
description: Register for a free live interview on Nov. 30 with Mr. Bankman-Fried, the former chief executive of the failed crypto exchange FTX, by Andrew Ross Sorkin.

title: Amazon Wants to Review Your Sleep. (No, Thanks.)
description: The new Halo Rise studies your body and breathing and rates your restfulness, from “Poor” to “Great.” Who needs this?

title: Is Spreading Medical Misinformation a Doctor’s Free Speech Right?
description: Two lawsuits in California have pre-emptively challenged a new law that would punish doctors for misleading patients about Covid-19.
